text: Kintu uniharule bhaneh ‘‘he hamro palanakarta hamra yatraharula'i durastha bana'ide'u. Uniharule svayam aphumathi nai aphno kubhalo gare. Tyasakarana hamile (uniharula'i nasta garera) uniharula'i katha bana'idiyaum, ra uniharula'i bilkula chinna bhinna garidiyaum. Niscaya nai yasama pratyeka thulo dhairyavan, krtajnako nimti dherai siksaharu chan
